chapter.text: nissandeh hamane manushy ko sarvottam sanrachana ke saath paida kiya
phir hamane use nikrshtatam dasha kee or lauta diya, jabaki vah svayan giranevaala bana
sivaay un logon ke jo eemaan lae aur jinhonne achchhe karm kie, to unake lie kabhee na samaapt honevaala badala hai
ab isake baad kya hai, jo badale ke vishay mein tumhen jhuthalae
kya allaah sab haakimon se bada haakim nahin hain
